1. PCDTBT

This is the name of a material. PCDTBT stands for Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):Poly(styrenesulfonate) with regio-regular polythiophene side chains. It is a conducting polymer used in organic electronics.

To identify the corresponding "Property Name," we need more context from the paragraph. However, based on the given information, it's not possible to determine the property name directly.
